scripts.build:style: node-sass src/style.scss src/style.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r src/style.css
scripts.build:style-editor: node-sass src/style-editor.scss src/style-editor.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r src/style-editor.css
scripts.build:style-editor-customizer: node-sass src/style-editor-customizer.scss src/style-editor-customizer.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r src/style-editor-customizer.css
scripts.build:print: node-sass src/print.scss src/print.css --output-style expanded && postcss -r src/print.css
